text: aur usakee nishaaniyon mein se yah bhee hai ki vah tumhen bijalee kee chamak bhay aur aasha utpann karane ke lie dikhaata hai. aur vah aakaash se paanee barasaata hai. phir usake dvaara dharatee ko usake nirjeev ho jaane ke pashchaat jeevan pradaan karata hai. nissandeh isamen bahut-see nishaaniyaan hai un logon ke lie jo buddhi se kaam lete hai
